name: Substitute Teacher (Ashwin K)
description:
DESCRIPTION

A fun and casual game made in 48 hours wherein the player plays the role of a substitute teacher trying to survive a single period, being in charge of the naughtiest class in the school.

How long can you last against the unruly mob?

GAME MECHANICS 

Tap or click on the students to punish them.

Punishing an innocent student will reduce your score while failing to punish a student breaking a rule will cost a life.

Losing all lives will get you fired.

The game is available for PC and Android devices.

  • Tap on the phone to interact 

  • Click on the mouse to interact.
